title: Steganos Privacy Suite 18
text:
User rating: 1 (100%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
Hurry up and win one of the 15 license keys Complete the tasks to get as many entries as possible. Your chances of winning increase with each entry! This offer is available for several days only. Join & Win Terms and conditions 
Win one of the 15 licenses for Steganos Privacy Suite 18! 
German-based software provider Steganos offers comprehensive protection for digital data with Steganos Privacy Suite 18. Users can use the security application to encrypt documents, images, passwords and email, and so surf the Internet securely. Privacy Suite inlcudes webcam protection, a Microsoft Edge browser plug-in and new email encryption powered by Mynigma. Passwords for all online accounts can be created automatically and are easily managed and administrated, regardless if it is on a computer, smartphone or tablet. With only one click you are able to delete all browser data and histories. And additionally you can now block tracking and advertising before information on you is stored, and increase your privacy with an anonymized browser. System Requirements: 
Windows 10/ 8/ 7; Min. 1 GB RAM (x32/x64); 200MB available disk space Publisher:
